description.narrative: To increase agricultural productivity and build resilience to climate change risks in the targeted smallholder farming and pastoralcommunities in Kenya, and in the event of an Eligible Crisis or Emergency, to provide immediate and effective response.

participating-org.narrative: Kenya Agriculture and Livestock Research Organisation ( KALRO)
Ministry of Agriculture, Livestock and Fisheries

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Assistant Project Accountants; Schedule 2, Section V, 2. | Description :The Recipient shall, by no later thanfour (4) months after the Effective Date, designate assistant accountants for each of the CPCUs under terms of referencesatisfactory to the Association and with qualifications satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :08-Sep-2017

Finance Agreement :Management Information System; Schedule 2, Section V, 3. | Description :The Recipient shall establish, by nolater than six (6) months after the Effective Date, a management information system database within the NPCU with globalpositioning system coordinates for tracking Subprojects, satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :09-Nov-2017

Finance Agreement :Participation Agreement; Schedule 2, Section I, D, 4. | Description :If by eighteen (18) months after theEffective Date, any Eligible CG has not entered into a Participation Agreement with the Recipient, the Recipient may select anadditional County to participate in the Project, using the criteria set forth in Section V of Schedule 2 to this Agreement and inthe Project Implementation Manual. | Due Date :09-Nov-2018

Finance Agreement :Project Internal Auditors; Schedule 2, Section V, 4. | Description :The Recipient shall, no later than four (4)months after the Effective Date, designate Project internal auditors at NPCU and each CPCU under terms of reference and withqualifications satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :08-Sep-2017
